data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chan, Tin-Yam, Komai, Tomoyuki (2017): A new shrimp species of the genus Lebbeus White, 1847 (Crustacea: Deacpoda: Caridea: Thoridae) from a deep-sea cold seep site off southwestern Taiwan. Zootaxa 4238 (3): 426-432, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4238.3.9|1 occurrence
